Name: Knight Runaway
About the game: The defender of good is in exile, but he still continues to fight evil and visiting new worlds - he faces new dangers and overcomes them. Knight Runaway is a platformer filled with various mechanisms and levels, each of which challenges the skills and nerves of the player. Features of the game: - Beautiful Pixel Art - Variety Of Levels - Music
